description:
Lieu finds out Joe is back in town and asks him to be his sparring partner. Mac Rosario had once lost everything, but made a miraculous comeback as the local hero.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Card ga Shimesu Orokamono wa Manuke na Doukeshi ja Nai
El tonto que muestra su carta no es un payaso estupido
カードが示す愚か者は間抜けな道化師じゃない
